com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Interface ActivityController.SystemServiceProvider

  • Enclosing class:
    ActivityController

    public static interface ActivityController.SystemServiceProvider
    An interface responsible for providing Android system services, given their name. It enables to override in one place all the Activity system services.
    Since:
    2012.02.12

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getSystemService(android.app.Activity activity, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object defaultService)
      Returns the handle to a system-level service by name.

    • Method Detail

      • getSystemService

        java.lang.Object getSystemService(android.app.Activity activity,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.Object defaultService)
        Returns the handle to a system-level service by name. The class of the returned object varies by the requested name.
        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity asking for the service
        name - the name of the desired service
        defaultService - the provided activity default system service (retrieved by invoking the Activity.getSystemService(String) method)
        Returns:
        the desired service, or null if no service corresponding to the provided name is available nor exists
        See Also:
        Activity#getSystemService(String)}
